verses.roman:
śuniyā vismita ha-ilā saba bhakta-gaṇa
svarūpa-gosāñi kichu ha-ilā vimana

synonyms: śuniyā—hearing; vismita—astonished; ha-ilā—became; saba—all; bhakta-gaṇa—the devotees; svarūpa-gosāñi—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī; kichu—somewhat; ha-ilā—became; vimana—morose.
translation: Hearing this, all the devotees were astonished, especially Svarūpa Dāmodara, who became somewhat morose.
